title: Drawing, Design for Rectangular Sideboard with Vases of Flowers, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Rectangular Sideboard with Vases of Flowers
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite lower right corner: OAK 21431 / Z [inverted "U"][triangle][box with dot itside] / dax; across left edge at center of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions.  In pen and red ink, across bottom right: [inverted "V"]XE[triangle][box with dot inside]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular sideboard with 4 square reeded legs; center front has 3 drawers arranged in 2 rows, flanked by suggested carved vases and bouquets; shallow top supported by backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Rectangular Sideboard with Vases of Flowers, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-48
